    border:none;
}
.balck_friday_product_codebox {
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:row;
    align-content:flex-end;
    justify-content:flex-start;
    align-items:center;
    margin-bottom:30px;
}
.balck_friday_product_codebox p {
    color:#f6ddb0;
    font-size:28px;
    font-weight:500;
    line-height:35px;
    margin:0;
}
.balck_friday_product_codebox img {
    width:100%;
    max-width:40px;
    margin:0 15px;
}
/*倒计时*/

#shopify-section-template--14475737169982__166735473386a52bc2 {
    position:absolute;
    margin-top:-162px;
    z-index:1;
    width:100%;
}
#epb-flip-clock {
    padding:40px 15px 10px 15px!important;
    margin:0!important;
    background-color:#312C22;
}
#epb-flip-clock .flip-clock-dividerht .flip-clock-label {
    font-size:14px;
    color:#FFFFFF;
    line-height:16px;
    text-transform:capitalize;
    top:-24px!important;
}
.flip-clock-wrapperht ul {
    width:46px!important;
}
#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(2)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(5)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(8)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(11)>li {
    left:3px!important;
}
#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(3)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(6)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(9)>li,#epb-flip-clock ul:nth-child(12)>li {
    left:-3px!important;
}
.flip-clock-wrapperht ul li a div.up:after {
    background:url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Black_Friday_time_text_bgm_256x256.png")center center no-repeat!important;
    top:37px!important;
    height:16px!important;
}
.flip-clock-wrapperht ul li a div.down:after {
    content:"";
    position:absolute;
    top:-10px;
    left:0;
    z-index:5;
    width:100%;
    height:16px;
    background:url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Black_Friday_time_text_bgm_256x256.png")center center no-repeat!important;
}
#epb_bar {
    padding:0!important;
}
#epb_message_one {
    background:url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Black_Friday_time_icon_1_256x256.png")center center no-repeat!important;
    width:60px;
    height:60px;
    margin:0 20px 0 o!important;
}
#epb_content {
    display:flex!important;
    flex-direction:row;
    align-content:center;
    justify-content:center;
    align-items:center;
}
.black-friday-50 {
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
}
.black-friday-50 span {
    font-size:32px;
    font-weight:400;
    color:#F6DDAE;
    line-height:38px;
    margin:0 30px 0 0;
}
.black-friday-50 button {
    width:160px;
    font-size:20px;
    font-weight:bold;
    color:#060606;
    line-height:23px;
    background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);
    background-image:url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Black_Friday_bgm_hover_b280cfbb-d78f-4e81-a7da-72596e7af657_256x256.png")!important;
    background-size:100% 100%;
}
.black-friday-50 button:hover {
    opacity:.9;
    color:#fff;
}
.flip-clock-wrapperht .flip {
    margin:0!important;
    box-shadow:none!important;
    border-radius:0!important;
    background:#121210!important;
}
.flip-clock-dotht {
    display:none!important;
}
.flip-clock-dividerht:first-child .flip-clock-label {
    width:92px!important;
}
.flip-clock-dividerht.hours .flip-clock-label,.flip-clock-dividerht.minutes .flip-clock-label,.flip-clock-dividerht.seconds .flip-clock-label {
    width:130px!important;
}
@media (max-width:768px) {
    #shopify-section-template--14475737169982__d9173877-0d74-49ef-ae60-75c5eed6188e {
        display:none;
    }
    #shopify-section-template--14475737169982__51ff89be-52b3-4bda-8376-5d99897c4eec {
        display:block;
    }
    #shopify-section-template--14475737169982__166735473386a52bc2 #epb_message_one,#shopify-section-template--14475737169982__166735473386a52bc2 #epb_message_two {
        display:none!important;
    }
    .balck_friday_product_box .balck_friday_product_pirce {
        font-size:20px;

    }

<style type="text/css">
 .hit-button {
  border-radius:56px;
  border:1px solid #FFFFFF;
  font-size:14px;
  font-weight:500;
  color:#FFFFFF;
  line-height:44px;
  text-align:center;
  cursor:pointer;
  height:44px;
  width:160px;
  margin:20px auto;
}
.hit-button a {
  font-size:14px;
  font-weight:500;
  color:#FFFFFF;
      display: inline-block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  
}
.hit-button:hover {
  background:#F6DDB0;
  border-color:#F6DDB0;
}
.hit-button:hover a {
  color:#000000;
}
.copy-code {
  display:flex;
  align-items:center;
  justify-content:center;
  margin-top:5px;
}
.code {
  color:#9f9e9a;
  font-size:12px;
  margin-right:4px;
}
.copy-btn {
  color:#f6ddb0;
  cursor:pointer;
}
@media (max-width:768px) {
  .copy-code {
  justify-content:flex-start;
}
.hit-button {
  margin:10px 0;
  height:32px;
  width:130px;
  line-height:32px;
}
}</style>
<script>
    $(function() {
  let timeId = null;
  $('[data-ug-copy-data]').click(function () {
  clearTimeout(timeId);
  timeId = setTimeout(() => {
  var copyText = $(this).attr('data-ug-copy-data');
  var input = document.createElement('input');
  input.setAttribute('value',copyText);
  document.body.appendChild(input);
  input.select();
  if (document.execCommand('copy')) {
  document.execCommand('copy');
  $(this).text('Copied');
  setTimeout( () => {
  $(this).text('Copy');
}
,2000)}document.body.removeChild(input);},200);});})
</script>
